project_plan.name: Weather Fetching Application in Python
project_plan.description: Build a Python program that fetches the current weather information for a given city using a public API and displays the temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in the terminal.

task.name: Set up the project environment and install necessary libraries (like requests).
Implement the function to fetch weather data from a public API based on the city input.
Parse the API response to extract temperature, humidity, and weather conditions.
Implement the display function to present the fetched information in the terminal.
Write tests for the data fetching and parsing functions to ensure data is retrieved and processed correctly.
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly.
